item.title: CVE-2024-30483|2024-03-29T13:03:45.621Z -- Simple Sponsorships -- Sponsors
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Simple Sponsorships Sponsors allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sponsors: from n/a through 3.5.1.
